(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Advertorial) (NNP Rockett) (NNP Girl))
      (CC and)
      (NP (PRP I)))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBG having)
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (NN sort))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP
                (NP (NNP Tea) (NNP Renaissance))
                (ADVP (RB ever))))
            (SBAR (IN since)
              (S
                (NP (PRP we))
                (VP (VBD came)
                  (ADVP (RB back))
                  (PP (IN from)
                    (NP (DT the) (NNP Dilmah) (NN tea) (NNS gardens)))))))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (NNP Sri) (NNP Lanka))))))
    (. .)))

dobj(having-8, sort-10)

  (S

      (NP (PRP we))

            (NP (JJ black) (NNS teas))))))

      (NP (EX there))
      (VP (VBD was)

          (NP (CD one))

            (WHNP (WDT that))

              (ADVP (RB really))
              (VP (VBD stood)

                (PP (IN as)
                  (NP

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (`` ``)
          (S
            (VP (VB show)
              (PRT (RP off))))
          ('' '') (NN tea))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (ADVP (RB always))
            (VP (VBP bring)
              (PRT (RP out))
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (WRB when))
                (S
                  (NP (NNS friends))
                  (VP (VBP come)
                    (PRT (RP over))
                    (SBAR (IN because)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP it))
                        (VP (VBZ is)
                          (NP (DT the)
                            (ADJP (RB always) (DT a))
                            (NN joy)
                            (S
                              (VP (TO to)
                                (VP (VB see)
                                  (S
                                    (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS friends))
                                    (VP (VB experience)
                                      (NP (DT the) (`` ``) (NN Wow)))))))))))))))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (JJ chemical) (NNS processes))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NNS leaves))
          (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
            (NP (NN photosynthesis))
            (-RRB- -RRB-)))))
    (VP (VBP undergo)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ fundamental) (NN change)))
    (. .)))

    (VP
      (VP
        (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP who))
            (S
              (VP (VBP have)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB be)
                      (NP (NNS virgins))))))))
          (-RRB- -RRB-))
        (VB use)
        (NP (NN gold))
        (NP (NNS scissors)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP
                (ADVP (RB carefully))
                (VB cut)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NNS buds))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN tea) (NNS plants)))))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB place)
        (NP (PRP them))
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP (DT a) (JJ golden) (NN platter)))))
    (. !)))

pobj(of-30, flavor-34)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NNP Rose))
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (NNP French) (NNP Vanilla))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB also))
      (ADJP (RB very) (JJ good)
        (PP (CC but)
          (PP (IN unlike)
            (NP (DT the) (JJ delicate) (NNP Earl) (NNP Grey))))))
    (, ,)))

nsubj(good-9, Rose-2)
prep(Rose-2, with-3)
nn(Vanilla-5, French-4)
pobj(with-3, Vanilla-5)
cop(good-9, is-6)
advmod(good-9, also-7)
advmod(good-9, very-8)
root(ROOT-0, good-9)
cc(unlike-11, but-10)
prep(good-9, unlike-11)

pobj(unlike-11, Grey-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (NN medium) (JJ bodied))
      (SBAR (IN so)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP get)
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP
                  (ADJP
                    (NP (DT a) (RB bit))
                    (JJR more))
                  (NN mouth))
                (VP (VBP feel)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB complement)
                        (NP (DT the)
                          (ADJP (RB wonderfully) (VBN floral))
                          (NNP Rose)
                          (CC and)
                          (JJ Vanilla) (NN fragrance))))))))))))
    (. .)))

    (INTJ (UH No))
    (VP (VB point)

        (NP (PRP me))

          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB describe)
                (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NN tea) (NNS flavors))

    (. .)))

    (NP

      (PP (IN for)
        (NP (PRP you)))
      (S

          (VP (VB appreciate)
            (NP (DT the) (NN tea))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB taste)

            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (PRP yourself)))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT All))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBD got)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB do))))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB sign)
            (PRT (RP up))
            (PP (IN at)
              (NP (PRP$ their) (NN website)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB receive)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT a) (JJ free) (NN sample))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP (CD 6) (JJ different) (NNP flavors) (NNP Dilmah) (NNP Exceptional) (NN tea)))
                        (VP (VBN delivered)
                          (PP (TO to)
                            (NP (PRP$ your) (NN mailbox))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (SINV
    (ADVP (RB Here))
    (VP (VBZ 's))
    (NP (DT the) (NN link))
    (: :)))

  (S
    (VP (VB http://dilmah.sg/trial-signup/))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Read)
      (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ previous) (NN post))
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Dilmah) (POS 's))
            (JJ orthodox) (NN tea))
          (VP (VBG making)
            (NP (NN process))
            (ADVP (RB here))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (VP (VB Read)
      (PP (IN about)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NNP MJF) (NN foundation) (POS 's))
          (JJ various) (JJ social) (NNS enterprises))
        (ADVP (RB here))))
    (. .)))
